name: combinatorial

mathematics, computing
  specialized relating to the arrangement of a number of elements from a set without putting them in any particular order : Although not a professional mathematician, he created an interesting problem in combinatorial analysis. The software is intended to be used for creating organizational charts and in solving combinatorial problems.
More examplesFewer examplesThe package gives users access to combinatorial algorithms.We will say that two trajectories 1 and 2 are of the same combinatorial class if they collide with the same sequence of walls.
